column5: Heading out to Belle River for the weekend plan on doing some smallie and walleye fishing....anyone been lately??? Any tips or info maybe a map??  Any help would be appreciated have never fishied this area before..

Tightline, go to www.marinecruiser.com    This will give you an idea of the lake. If you're launching out of Belle River Marina try fishing the hump a couple of miles east. ( you'll see the perch guys there) Pay attention you don't fish in American water,-unless you have a Michigan license. Hope this helps.
